text: Minister of Foreign Affairs of the Republic of Korea, Yun Byung-se is scheduled to visit Sri Lanka on 15th March 2017 for an official visit to mark the 40th anniversary of diplomatic relations between Sri Lanka and the Republic of Korea.Minister Yun is scheduled to hold bilateral discussions with Hon. Mangala Samaraweera, Minister of Foreign Affairs on 15th March 2017.This is the first visit to Sri Lanka in 31 years by a Minister of Foreign Affairs of the Republic of Korea. The last such visit took place in 1986, when Foreign Minister Lee Won-kyung undertook an official visit to Sri Lanka.The visit by Minister Yun is expected to further strengthen the warm ties and bilateral cooperation between the two countries.Minister of Foreign Affairs of the Republic of Korea, Yun Byung-se is scheduled to visit Sri Lanka on 15th March 2017 for an official visit to mark the 40th anniversary of diplomatic relations between Sri Lanka and the Republic of Korea.Minister Yun is scheduled to hold bilateral discussions with Hon. title: Foreign Minister of Republic of Korea to Visit Sri Lanka
